Importing Data: beaches.csv
```{r}
# rachael cooper
beaches <- read.csv("beaches.csv")
```

Setting the aes/adding Labels
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

beaches<-beaches%>%na.omit()%>%group_by(year)
ggplot(beaches, aes(x=year, y=rainfall)) +geom_bar(stat='identity', colour="orange", fill="blue") + theme(axis.text.x =element_text(angle = 45))+labs(title = "Rainfall vs Year" ) + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```
